bug.short_desc: In Chrome text fields and areas are catching focus on a drag session (mosemove with pressed left button)

long_desc.thetext:
This issue is only re-produce-able on Chrome. If you press and hold the left mouse button anywhere on the application and drag over an input element, this element will catch the focus. Even the cursor will be changed.
This is true even using native html.
As I could see, Chrome is showing that behavior if you use "user-selection:none" CSS. I guess this is an issue which should be fixed by the webkit or chrome project.
Small example:
<!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <style> * { -webkit-user-select: none; } </style> </head> <body> <input type="text" value="Mouse"> </body> </html>
